column4: Good morning everyone, I have an issue with Evolution.  When i click print via either the print button, or the drop down menu Evoltion causes a segmentation fault and closes.  Does anyone know how to find out what is causing it, or a fix for it?
I'd start by looking on bugs.ubuntu.com to see if anyone else is having the issue.

thanks, I already looked and although there are similar issues, there is none that match it.  I would like to report the bug to them, but really am unsure how to collect enough information to be helpful.
Have you looked at https://wiki.ubuntu.com/DebuggingEvolution and https://wiki.ubuntu.com/DebuggingProcedures yet?
